text: HBO Kids (formerly Jam) is an American television block for children. It is operated by Home Box Office, Inc. (HBO). The block is shown in the mornings. HBO Kids runs on HBO Family, HBO's sister station for children and families. The block runs from 6:00 am to between 8:00 and 9:00 am (ET) on weekdays. The programs on the block are not shown in a standard half-hour timeslot. The block used to have an weekday 4pm timeslot. That timeslot was filled with The Electric Company. The block used to also air on weekends until October 2020. ==Related pages== *List of programs broadcast by HBO Kids ==References== Kids Category:Children's television series
title: HBO Kids
